name: Table zombies - Augmented Reality Game
blurb: An augmented reality game for iPhone / Android that brings the zombies to your table. Bring the fight to the table.

rewards.reward: Level 0 - Thanks for your support! You get 1 free copy of the game, this will be at 50% discount to the $1.99 launch price(This offer is valid only for Android devices). hopefully we\u2019ll convince you to get more involved. Lend your hands to make the zombies raise.

Level 1 - Thanks for your support! You get 4 free copies of the game (so you can send some to your friends), this will be at 40% discount to the $1.99 launch price(This offer is valid only for Android devices). You\u2019ll receive an Augmented Reality Thank you email and pdf marker for individual zombies, hopefully we\u2019ll convince you to get more involved. Lend your hands to make the zombies raise.

Level 2 - Pleadge $15 or more - You will get a chance to vote for the zombie model design and You will get a set of 10 post cards which is Augmented Reality enabled. 10 cards would augment individual zombies (Shipping to Australia add $4, International add $7)

Level 3 - Pledge $50 or more - You will receive two Augmented Reality enabled interactive T-shirts with design and sizes of your choosing PLUS the Post cards, and \u201cThanks\u201d mention. (Shipping to Australia add $3, International add $7)

Level 4 - Pledge $ 100 or more - You will receive Five Augmented Reality enabled interactive T-shirts with design and sizes of your choosing PLUS the Post cards, and \u201cThanks\u201d mention. (Shipping to Australia add $4, International add $10)

Level 5 - Pledge $ 150 or more - You will receive one Augmented Reality enabled interactive Hoodies with design and size of your choosing and a Zombie slipper PLUS the Post cards, and \u201cThanks\u201d mention. (Shipping to Australia add $4, International add $10)

Level 6 - Pledge $ 500 or more - We make you a Zombie or a survivor, send in your photo and we will turn you into a zombie to be played in the game and  You will receive two Augmented Reality enabled interactive Hoodies with design and sizes of your choosing PLUS the Post cards, and \u201cThanks\u201d mention. (Shipping to Australia add $4, International add $10)

Level 7 - Pledge $ 1000 or more - We make your locality as zombie infested, send a photo of your locality and we will turn your locality into a zombie land to be played in the game or we can advertise your product or service inside the game (inside the environment) and  You will receive two Augmented Reality enabled interactive Hoodies with design and sizes of your choosing PLUS the Post cards, and \u201cThanks\u201d mention. (Shipping to Australia add $4, International add $10)\r\nand Last but not Least, we will add you an executive producer in our credits.

Level 8 - Pledge $ 2000 or more - We will work with you to create your own Zombie Augmented Reality game and help publish it as a standalone app at apple store and Google play. Your game creation will be one of our top priority on our list and we will work very closely with you. You will get assistance from our professional team in creating your game from start to end and  You will receive two Augmented Reality enabled interactive Hoodies with design and sizes of your choosing PLUS the Post cards, and \u201cThanks\u201d mention. (Shipping to Australia add $4, International add $10)
